directions: Whisk first 4 ingredients until blended; pour over chicken in slow cooker. Cook on LOW 4 to 5 hours (or on HIGH 2 to 3 hours).
COOK pasta as directed on package, omitting salt; drain. Serve topped with chicken mixture; sprinkle with parsley.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  reduced-sodium condensed cream of mushroom soup
1/4 cup KRAFT Tuscan House Italian Dressing
1 1/2 pounds boneless skinless chicken thighs, cut into bite-size pieces
title: Angel Chicken
